name: Phong Nha Coco Riverside
address: Phong Nha Village, Son Trach, Bo Trach, Quang Binh, Phong Nha, Việt Nam
description:
Phong Nha Coco Riverside có khu vườn, phòng chờ chung, sân hiên và nhà hàng ở Phong Nha. Chỗ nghỉ cung cấp lễ tân 24/24, dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay, bếp chung và Wi-Fi miễn phí ở toàn bộ chỗ nghỉ.

Một số phòng có bếp với lò nướng và minibar.

Đi xe đạp là hoạt động được ưa chuộng trong khu vực. Ngoài ra, khách sạn có dịch vụ thuê ô tô.

Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Đồng Hới, cách Phong Nha Coco Riverside 38 km.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi
review.comment_positive: Die Lage war gut!
review.comment_negative:
Vorweg muss ich sagen, dass ich niemand bin, der schlechte Bewertungen öffentlich teilt. In diesem Fall muss ich allerdings eine Ausnahme machen und meine Erfahrungen in dieser Unterkunft teilen.
Wir haben diese Unterkunft aufgrund ihrer guten Bewertungen gebucht. Leider können wir nicht sagen, ob diese sehr positiven Schilderungen ehemaliger Gäste tatsächlich der  Wahrheit entsprechen, oder ob wir einfach nur Pech hatten. Die durchweg positiven Eindrücke konnten wir jedenfalls nicht teilen. Ohne jemanden persönlich angreifen zu wollen: unser „Deluxe Doppelzimmer“ war nicht sauber. Wir sind uns durchaus bewusst, dass der europäische Standard nicht dem vietnamesischen entspricht. Wir sind nun seit einigen Monaten auf Reisen, haben in etlichen Hostels, Airbnbs etc. übernachtet, haben demnach so einiges gesehen, und dennoch müssen wir sagen, dass die Unterkunft die mit Abstand unsauberste und unangenehmste war. Gereinigt wurde das Zimmer allenfalls mit kaltem Wasser, überall, wirklich überall krabbelten Ameisen und Insekten rum, das Wasser aus der Dusche blieb während unseres gesamten Aufenthalts kalt. Unter der Berücksichtigung, dass andere Länder andere Sitten pflegen, kann man unter Umständen darüber hinwegsehen. Was jedoch unmöglich war, war die Hellhörigkeit der Unterkunft und somit die herrschende Lautstärke des Zimmers. Wer im 10 Minuten Takt geweckt werden möchte, ist hier richtig. Man hört alles. Dadurch, dass die Zimmer zudem keine richtige Tür haben, sondern nur einen Türrahmen mit Milchglas, wird es darüber hinaus auch nie richtig dunkel im Zimmer.
Neben den Unanehmlichkeiten im Zimmer empfanden wir auch die Organisation der Unterkunft als unangenehm. Obwohl auf Booking vermerkt ist, dass die Unterkunft mit Kreditkarte zahlbar wäre, wurde uns auf Nachfrage mitgeteilt, dass plötzlich nur Barzahlung möglich wäre. Der Grund hierfür war immer ein anderer.

Great to be given extremely tasty bahn mi sandwiches to eat in the taxi as we left at 6am to get a train, and they understandably do not serve breakfast at that time. Walking distance from lots of restaurants and the boats to the astonishing Phong Nha cave.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
When we landed in Phong Nha town after a nights journey on a sleeper bus, it was raining quite heavily and the weather was very cloudy. The hotel made arrangements to pick us up and let us check in early. The property is on the banks of the river and the balcony affords incredible views of the river and the mountains beyond. 
We booked our day tour of Phong Nha and Paradise Cave with the help of the hotel reception and were blown away by the scenery in the caves. They also helped us book a bus on to our next destination.
The host, San, took great care of me and my wife and was always around to help. She offered us some local wine during dinner and it was a unique experience. We felt more like family than guests at this hotel. Would highly recommend staying over here.

review.comment_positive: What a beautiful spot, with lovely patios overlooking the river. The family that runs this homestay/hotel made us feel very much at home. They were also very helpful coordinating a trip into the caves for us, as well as rides to and from Dong Hoi Train Station.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: This is the ultimate best homestay experience we’ve had so far in Vietnam. The manager Hùng and his wife did is everything they could to make our stay as comfortable as possible! They organized the most amazing tour for us and picked us up from the trainstation. Even when his car broke down on the way to the trainstation his brother came to bring us and we still managed to get to our train on time. The service was tremendous. The rooms were super clean and the beds comfortable! Would 10/10 recommend staying with them!

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
My stay at this riverside gem was nothing short of enchanting. Nestled by the tranquil river, this hotel is a haven for those seeking a perfect blend of natural beauty and impeccable hospitality.

From the moment we stepped into the lobby, the warm greeting from hosts Sam and Hung set the tone for a memorable experience. Their genuine friendliness and eagerness to assist added a personal touch that made the stay feel like a home away from home.

One standout aspect of our visit was the invaluable information provided by Sam and Hung regarding the conditions of the nearby cave. Their insights not only enhanced our experience but also demonstrated their commitment to ensuring guests have all the information they need for a safe and enjoyable exploration.

Our late-night arrival was met with unparalleled hospitality. Sam and Hung went above and beyond by arranging delicious vegetarian food from outside, saving us from the hassle of searching for a meal after a long journey. It was a thoughtful gesture that spoke volumes about their dedication to guest comfort.

The view from the hotel was nothing short of breathtaking. Waking up to the sight of the river gently flowing and the surrounding nature in all its glory was a serene start to each day. It truly felt like a retreat from the hustle and bustle of everyday life.

In conclusion, if you're looking for a riverside escape with hosts who genuinely care about your experience, this hotel is a hidden gem waiting to be discovered. The combination of great hospitality, insider knowledge, and a stunning view makes it a standout choice for those seeking a retreat that nourishes both the soul and the senses.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Joli emplacement au bord de la rivière. La chambre avec vue est jolie. Possible de faire un chek-in early moyennant des frais supplémentaire. Réservation de bus pour Hué ou Hoi An possible à l’hôtel.
review.comment_negative: Difficulté de trouver quelqu’un pour le chek-out alors que nous prenions le bus

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
La vue est magnifique sur la montagne et l’eau. 

Les petits déjeuners sont variés et bons. 

L’hôte est venu nous chercher à l’arrêt de bus gratuitement, comme il était tard et que le bus était en retard. C’était très apprécié. 

Les hôtes sont aidants et donnent beaucoup d’information.
review.comment_negative:
La chambre était petite, sombre et humide. 

Les chambres ne sont pas insonorisés. 

Nous ne conseillons pas de louer des motos via l’établissement. Elles ne sont pas en bon état et elles sont dispendieuses. Nous avons eu quelques malentendus avec les hôtes lors de la location.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
We arrived in the middle of the night, at 4 a.m. and the owner was here to open the door for us and take us to our room, that's commitment ! 💪

The couple of owners is always ready to help, even if you have a hundred questions, . Booking bus tikets, laundry, motorbike, gasoline, caving tours and kayaking 🛶 (which we heavily recommend !). Everything was smooth and easy. 

You can help yourself, take a beer in the fridge and drink it while watching the river. It was perfect. 🍺

Ps : If you take a motorbike with 2 people on it to go to Paradise Cave, be carful : it gets overwhelmed when going up hill too fast and stops sometimes. Be gentle with the engine ! 🛵💨

review.rating: Elegant simplicity and warm hospitality right on a beautiful bend in the river
review.room_type: Phòng Gia đình Nhìn ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: We absolutely loved being right on the river — with direct access for swimming and paddle boarding (paddle boards available to borrow from the homestay) — it had a simply beautiful aspect with the mountains beyond and the hazy heat peacefully enveloping the river. Sitting out on the deck with a cold beer and a book, bathing in the late afternoon sun as it dipped down below the mountains across the way, surrounded by the chatter of frogs and crickets was simply bliss, perfect relaxation and a heavenly way to soak up the gentle pace of Phong Nha. Some reviews mention that it’s quite far from the rest of the village but we were still close to many restaurants/shops and it was only a ten minute walk to reach the hubbub. I think being right in the river makes up for any sense of distance. Hung (sp?), Chang (?) and their family were all totally gorgeous to be around, especially the adorable Leo (age 2.5) who flung himself at us whenever he saw us and bounced on my legs, clambered up my husband, bounded into my son’s arms and generally charmed us all. Hung even volunteered to be our driver for the day (for which we paid him of course) and took us to nearby Bong Lai Valley (absolutely recommend 100%) so that we could visit the hilarious Duck Stop, and have a swim and a drink at The Pub With Cold Beer, and visit Monkey Bridge Farm. All were excellent, chilled out diversions after our day of trekking in the jungle and we were so grateful to him for chauffeuring us around since the only other way we could have got there would have been to hire motorcycles (no thanks, not with three kids), borrow the free bikes (but 15km trip in 37° heat on busy crazy Vietnamese roads didn’t appeal) or walking 3hrs in said heat (literally stupid). Instead, we got the ease and comfort of Hung’s 7-seater air-conditioned car and he was so kind about hanging around while we just totally indulged, plus was able to give us lots of local insight while he drove. Oh!

review.comment_positive:
Phong Nha Coco Riverside is a hidden gem that offers a tranquil retreat amidst the natural beauty of Phong Nha. The idyllic riverside location, breathtaking views, and comfortable accommodations create an unforgettable experience. The attentive service, delicious dining options, and proximity to Phong Nha National Park further enhance the overall appeal of this charming establishment. If you are seeking a peaceful and rejuvenating stay in Phong Nha, I highly recommend Phong Nha Coco Riverside as an exceptional choice.

The staff at Phong Nha Coco Riverside demonstrated exceptional service and warm hospitality throughout my stay. From the moment I arrived, they made me feel welcomed and attended to my every need. Their local knowledge and willingness to assist with recommendations, arranging tours(jungle boss cave trek), and providing transportation(ride to the airport) made my visit to Phong Nha seamless and enjoyable.

review.comment_negative: During our four night stay, the rooms were not serviced once. No one came to check to make sure there was enough toilet paper or soap or anything else. The water in the room was a refillable bottle that was used on the first day and then never refilled. Beds were never made, towels were never checked or replaced. I think doing a basic room service at least every couple of days makes sense and having someone make your bed and empty the bins every day is a nice touch that was missing in this case.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: We LOVE the breathtaking scene! Wow the views are incredible there! The staff were sooo accomodating, going out of their way to help us with anything we needed and the food is wonderful!
review.comment_negative: We didn’t realise the shower had hot water that you needed to turn on so we had cold showers haha!

review.room_type: Phòng Gia đình Nhìn ra Vườn
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi
review.comment_positive: We absolutely loved our stay at Coco riverside. Run by the most lovely family, who we’re so helpful with tours and transportation to/ from Phong Nha. The restaurant serves excellent food all day, and you can’t beat the view! 10/10 would recommend!!!
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
Phòng Gia đình Nhìn ra Vườn
review.comment_positive:
Great location with view on the river. Very kind big family that helps with all travel concerns. We could use the kitchen to cook baby porridge. Simple breakfast, big coffee served ! Our kids enjoyed having other kids of the host family around.
There is an older complex with rooms and a newer building. Not all rooms have view on the river but the common terrace has. Very relaxing easy stay! 10 minutes walk to the center
review.comment_negative: Moisture and mosquitos is commen problem of the region. Our stroller got moldy after not using it for one week and just keeping it in the room. But everyone of the homestay helped us to wash and dry the stroller. Clammy clothes and mosquito bites over night especially for the children

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: lovely family and beautiful view from the room!

review.room_type: Phòng Gia đình Nhìn ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: Leaving Coco Riverside after a couple of days feels like leaving home. The location itself is charming with a lovely view into the countryside. The home cooked food is fresh and absolutely delicious; the rooms and beds are comfortable. The whole family welcomes you with great hospitality, cares for you, is always open for a chat and offers helpful advice on tours in the Phong Nha Area. I highly recommend this Homestay and would go there any time again!

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
Phòng Deluxe Đôi nhìn ra quang cảnh Núi
review.comment_positive: Handy location. Lovely view out over the river
review.comment_negative:
Minor things: it’s the height of summer and while the room has an aircon, it only works when the key is inserted, so you come back to a very hot room. A
fan would have been good.
Also the glass door can be an issue if you’re room is near the stairs. The room is flooded with light whenever someone turns on the stairwell light, and the internal lights from the rooms opposite shine in as well. A curtain or blind over the door would be handy. 

Lastly, the hotel organised a car to transport me to the train station. Another 3 women were also leaving at that exact same time. We realised when we got there, but it would hav made sense to ask if we’d like to share. We were all from the same country and all going to the same destination and the same time.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
Phòng Gia đình Nhìn ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: Personnel gentil. Terrasse pour le petit déjeuner agréable juste en surplomb de la rivière. Chambre confortable. Petit prix.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Bardzo przyjazny i pomocny personel, dobre śniadania. Pokój z przepięknym widokiem.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia đình Nhìn ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: The staff were all really nice and super accommodating. Location was perfect, not too far from all the restaurants and amenities.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Wow, still looking back to this place with excitement and joy. This place was amazing. Really nice family host. They were super helpful and really kind. Place was also very beautiful with the most amazing view. My room was spacious and clean. Really recommend this place to anyone visiting Phong nha!!!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Đôi nhìn ra quang cảnh Núi
review.comment_positive:
El personal es realmente amable y te ofrece información sobre tours que hay por la zona.
El sitio tiene mucho encanto con vistas hacia el río y la habitación es muy amplia.
review.comment_negative:
Durante las dos noches nos despertaron los ruidos de las ratas que correteaban por el entretecho. Al ser de madera, realmente parecía que estaban en la misma habitación.
Sabemos que eran ratas porque después los vimos fuera de la casa correteando.

Me da pena escribir esta crítica porque el trato recibido fue inmejorable pero fue un factor que nos influyó en nuestra estancia.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi
review.comment_positive: We kwamen 's nachts toe met de nachtbus vanuit Tam Coc en we kregen direct een kamer waar we nog even konden bijslapen.

review.comment_positive: The location is near the harbor, and it's by the river so the view is quite nice. From the homestay we can easily walk to wherever we needed to go. The room was clean, but the bed is maybe a bit small for 2 male adults (we have 7 men but have to use 2 double bed room and 1 single). Overall It is highly recommend to book a stay here

review.rating: A Gem by the River - Thanks Hung & Wife!

review.rating: A peaceful stay with the most incredible views! Highly reccomend!
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: We had a wonderful stay at Coco Riverside! The staff were very attentive, the breakfast delicious and the room was clean & comfortable. The hotel is also only about 5-10min walk to the centre. The views were amazing!! We relaxed, had breakfast and had beers looking out over the mountains. You could also see the views from our room! The staff made things easy and helped arrange a tour for us and our taxi to Dong Hoi. HIGHLY recommend staying here for a beautiful, peaceful escape!
review.comment_negative: There was nothing we didn’t like about our stay here! It was a great base to explore a new area of Vietnam.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive:
first of all - such a stunning and beautiful accomodation. the room is comfortable, spacious and it costs next to nothing. the view and area is very gorgeous. right on the river, with amazing mountain views. 
the food was really good as well, breakfast is included in the price of your room. we pretty much only ate from the restaurant as the food was so well cooked and made with love. 

THE STAFF. i cannot express my gratitude and appreciation for these kind souls. it was family ran, with sisters brothers and kids helping out. every single staff member went above and beyond. my friend was very unwell and they provided us with so much love and care, organising transport for us, helping us see the nurse and receive medical attention. we have never felt so loved and cared for. truly amazing. 

please stay with them. the accomodation is beautiful and the staff are even more beautiful

review.comment_positive:
Lo staff la camera 106 con una splendida vista, splendido panorama.
Gli spring rolls alle verdure, spaziali. 
I tour proposti dalla struttura (paradaise e darke caves), il servizio lavanderia compreso di asciugatrice. La famiglia stessa. Il servizio gratuito di biciclette con le quali abbiamo poturo visitare il villaggio, è stato tutto magico. Ci mancherà Phong Nha. 
Anche i cagnolini erano molto dolci, peccato che non c'era un gatto a bordo fiume servono ;)
review.comment_negative: L'unica cosa quando fai la doccia so allaga tutto e tarda ad asciugare.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn

review.rating: điểm 10 cho chất lượng nha các bạn trẻ.
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
2 vợ chồng son có con 1 tuổi :)) bỏ lại cả tình yêu nhỏ bé ở nhà cho ông bà ngoại trông 2 ngày 2 đêm để bố mẹ nó đi chơi.  Đi tầm 25-27 tháng 4 - 2021. Về nhà được 2 hôm thì dịch covid lần thứ 4 trở lại hoành hành. May quá, vợ quất là chồng phải đi. Có quá nhiều người đi sau đợt vc mình đi xong bị đì lây các kiểu vì dính dịc, hihi. 
Ai đắn đo thì đọc thêm view tiếp nè. 
 :)) Cảnh đẹp, Con người, nơi lưu trú, đồ ăn, giá cả, đi lại,.... tất cả đều rất đáng đồng tiền bát gạo mà không hề đắt đỏ, thỏa mãn nhu cầu. Từ kiểu ăn đến kiểu chơi, như ý. Điểm 10 cho chất lượng (ý là book được em phòng nghỉ ngon nhất khu này nha ý là phòng có view đẹp nhất dãy Phong nha đó). Đặc biệt chọn được homstay Phong Nha Coco Riverside ưng nhất vịnh trung bộ nè. Cả 2 vợ chồng đều vui chơi nghỉ dưỡng cân đối thời gian được mà không hề mệt mỏi như đi tuor. Những trò chơi cảm giác phiêu lưu mạo hiểm không thể nào quên được ở Sông chày hang tối. ước có thật nhiều tiền để đi tiếp .... ha ha :)) Đúng là vui chơi không hối tiếc.
review.comment_negative: Về là không thích rồi, tuyệt vời như thế cơ mà nhỉ :))

Die Familie ist super lieb, spricht zudem sehr gutes Englisch und kann auch bei Buchungen von Ausflügen und/oder Busfahrten unterstützen. Unsere Anreise ist etwas früher als geplant erfolgt (4 Uhr nachts), die Besitzerin hat sich dafür jedoch extra einen Wecker gestellt und hat uns ein Early Check-In ermöglicht (worüber wir extrem dankbar gewesen sind).

review.comment_positive:
Er was een verjaardagsfeestje van de familie op het terras. We werden uitgenodigd om er bij te komen zitten, kregen gratis bier en eten en werden helemaal ondergedompeld in de cultuur.

Je kon alles regelen via hen: tours, ze brengen je zelf naar bepaalde plaatsen, regelde een pick-up voor onze nachtbus, .. 

We kwamen pas toe rond 23u omwille van de nachtbus, dit was geen enkel probleem: we wouden de volgende dag al een tour doen naar de caves en kregen alle informatie via whatsapp om te boeken

Alle waren sehr zuvorkommend und höflich. Das von ihnen gekochte Abendessen, das wir mit Aussicht auf den Fluss einnahmen, schmeckte uns sehr.

review.comment_positive: San and Hung were amazing hosts. They were efficient and helpful in organising tours and drop offs for us. The food was tasty and we enjoyed sitting in the courtyard looking out on the river. Recommend for a few nights stay in Phong nha.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Đôi nhìn ra quang cảnh Núi
Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: It was a wonderful stay at Phong Nha Coco Riverside.The room is clean and  meets our basic needs.The hosts are very nice and supportive. We ordered food from their kitchen for 3 days and they were all excellent (with a very reasonable price). They also offer pick-up service straight from the airport (and if you are lucky, you will be offered free photoshoot along the way "home" lol; he def has a skill for that). Thanks Phong Nha Coco Riverside and Hung's family for being a part of our great experience there!

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
Phòng Gia đình Nhìn ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: The view of the river from the homestay is amazing. The rooms were spacious and well-equipped, and the homestay has paddle boards you can take on the river when it's calm. The family was very friendly and accommodating. We arrived very early in the morning from a night bus and they picked us up and let us check into our room early. We had cool weather when there so unfortunately we couldn't make the most of our stay but the family was thoughtful enough to bring us extra blankets for the cool nights.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
Phòng Gia đình Nhìn ra Vườn
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi
review.comment_positive: View cực chill, sạch sẽ, yên bình, nhân viên cực nhiệt tình và dễ mến

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive:
L'hôtel est confortable et bien placé. Les hôtes se plient en quatre pour que votre séjour à Phong Nha soit réussi !

Je suis arrivé en pleine nuit à Phong Nha et j'ai pu accéder à une chambre temporaire pour la fin de la nuit (la chambre que j'avais réservé pour la nuit suivante n'était pas encore libre) pour une somme modique.
Le lendemain matin j'ai pu me joindre en toute dernière minute à une excursion dans les grottes de Phong Nha grâce aux conseils et à la réactivité des hôtes.

La chambre était grande et très confortable, propre, et lumineuse !
La vue depuis la terrasse est à couper le souffle, et c'est un bonheur d'y prendre ne petit déjeuner, un verre ou un repas.

Je reviendrai sans hésiter.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia đình Nhìn ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: Lage/Terrasse
review.comment_negative: Frühstück

review.room_type: Phòng Gia đình Nhìn ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: Bữa sáng không có nhiều lựa chọn nhưng rất vừa miệng, bao gồm cả đồ uống. Chỗ ngồi ăn view sông núi rất đẹp. Phòng ở rộng rãi, sạch sẽ. Chủ nhà rất thân thiện. Tôi đặt ăn cả trưa và tối ở đây, các bữa đều rất ngon và chất lượng, giá hợp lý. Chỗ nghỉ có đường xuống bờ sông, buổi sáng trẻ con có thể chơi xúc cát, buổi chiều nước lên thì tắm sông, nước nông và trong an toàn cho trẻ nhỏ. Nhà nghỉ còn có dịch vụ đưa đón ở ga, sân bay và đưa đi các điểm du lịch cực kỳ thuận tiện.

review.comment_positive:
Phong Nha Coco Riverside made our stay in Phong Nha incredible.

We arrived very early in the morning by night bus, and they were able to fix a room for us to stay in, even though they were fully booked for the night. This really saved our day.

They were super helpful in booking a tour (we chose the elephant cave and mada valley tour which was incredible), and took care of everything surrounding the tour.

We checked out early in the morning to catch a train and not only did they book transport to the train station for us, but even picked us up breakfast for the road!

The room was really nice, really clean and great ammeneties. The breakfast was also very good, many different options and coffee.

Overall we couldn’t have wished for a better Homestay during our trip to Phong Nha, highly recommend!

review.rating: Fantastic location right on the river
review.room_type: Phòng Gia đình Nhìn ra Vườn
review.comment_positive:
We had a wonderful stay at the Coco Riverside. The location is excellent - right on the river, very close to lots of restaurants and everything you need, but a nice quiet area (we noticed one night there were bars playing loud techno music up the other end of town - so glad we didn't have to listen to that!). The breakfast was good, we tried the pho, omelette and pancakes and it was all very tasty (my daughter declared it the best banana pancake she'd ever eaten!). The family who runs the Homestay are lovely and were helpful to our every need. They picked us up from the train station at 6am in a safe, spacious car and made an effort to check us in early, which was appreciated after an overnight train ride. Also assisted with transport around Phong Nha and to Hue afterwards which was great. 
The view of the river is just magical!

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: We had the most amazing stay at Coco Riverside. Although we only stayed one night the amazing staff made the experience unforgettable. The service we experienced was one of the best so far in our travels. We got picked up from Dong Hoi and taken straight to the accommodation. The room was amazing and just like the photos!! The view of the river from both our room and from the lobby was beautiful! We had a tour the following morning with a 7am pickup and the staff ensured that breakfast was ready for us earlier so we had time to eat. This was much appreciated! They also organised our VIP20 bus to Hanoi which we couldn’t have done on our own. Overall I am extremely impressed and would highly recommend this place to anyone.

The homestay is just perfect as we stayed in the room thats on the river’s edge so had beautiful lanterns on the deck. This is highly recommended and you will not be disappointed.

review.comment_positive: The staff were on the ball from the moment I arrived to when I left.  Awesome river front scenery to view from the restaurant making you feel relaxed and reenergised.  Great location to base yourself for the Phong Nha, and Hang Tien cave systems.  The tour guide will come in and find you waiting in the restaurant.  Good dinner, and breakfast.  Got to park my motorcycle right outside my ground level room.
review.comment_negative: The room toilet made occasional burbling noises but nothing to worry about.  Front door was sometimes a pain to lock/unlock.

review.rating: Pratique pour un séjour à Phong Nha

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Đôi nhìn ra quang cảnh Núi

review.rating: Wir fühlten uns sehr gut aufgenommen und würden wieder kommen.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Đôi nhìn ra quang cảnh Núi
review.comment_positive: Wir wurden spät in der Nacht sehr herzlich von der Familie empfangen. Das Zimmer ist klein und einfach eingerichtet, aber vollkommen ausreichend. Die Aussicht ist der Wahnsinn! Man kann jeden Morgen direkt mit Blick auf die Berge frühstücken. Essen kochen ist Familienangelegenheit, jeder schwingt den Kochlöffel. Es schmeckt sehr lecker! Fried Noodles with Vegetables war unsere Leibspeise. Am Tag der Ankunft wurden wir diskret gefragt was unsere Pläne sind, woraufhin wir super informiert worden sind bezüglich Touren und Wanderungen. Selbst um 22/23 Uhr konnten Sie uns noch für die Tour am nächsten Tag anmelden. Wir haben eine Dschungel Wanderung von 9km gemacht. Sehr aufregend und manchmal brenzlig, aber wir würden es sofort wieder tun. :) Der Laundry Service war super, die saubere Wäsche war schnell wieder verfügbar.  Als wir abreisten, hat und Leo‘s Papa noch kurz an die Bushaltestelle gefahren, das war sehr lieb. Wir vermissen Leo. :)
review.comment_negative: Die vermieteten Roller waren nicht gut, sie wurden extern hergebracht. Mein Roller hatte Probleme mit den Bremsen, er „pumpte“ beim Bremsen. Der Roller meiner Freundin ging immer aus wenn kein Gas gegeben wurde (z. B. bergabwärts), scheint als würde das Standgas nicht funktionieren. In der bergigen Region gefährlich - vielleicht macht es Sinn den Anbieter zu wechseln.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Le personnel est très arrangeant. Nous sommes arrivés de nuit plus tôt que prévu et ils nous ont trouvé une chambre le temps que la nôtre soit prête. L'emplacement est idéal et la vue est magnifique.
review.comment_negative: Le lit est un peu dur.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: mooie ligging
review.comment_negative: hard bed

review.room_type: Phòng Gia đình Nhìn ra Vườn
Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
De locatie aan de rand van de rivier is geweldig met een waanzinnig uitzicht op de bergen! Wij hadden een kamer met uitzicht op de rivier en bergen. Beter kon niet!

Behulpzame en lieve eigenaren die goed Engels spreken. Wij kwamen vroeg in de middag aan en konden meteen inchecken.
Het eten is hier prima! Ze kunnen allerlei tours boeken. Leuke tips gekregen om de omgeving te verkennen op een scooter (botanische tuin, Bong lai swing nature farm) naast natuurlijk een bezoek aan de grotten.
Dit is de mooiste plek waar wij tot nu toe hebben gelogeerd in Vietnam. Dat uitzicht....
review.comment_negative: De bedden waren een behoorlijk hard.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia đình Nhìn ra Vườn

review.comment_positive: Very nice and friendly family who runs this accomodation. Highly recommended.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Đôi nhìn ra quang cảnh Núi
review.comment_positive: This was the most beautiful family run property in the heart of Phong Nha. Pretty like a postcard with the most stunning view of the river and hills pictures really dont do it justice. We had the most wonderful time in this peaceful setting and wished we could stay longer. The family who run Coco Riverside are so helpful and friendly with booking tours and general advice on the area. The food at the restaurant was very tasty and they catered well to different dietary requirements. Very reasonably priced drinks available on site also. Having a beer outside and looking out at the river was one of the highlights of our visit to Vietnam, if you want the true Phong Nha experience you must stay at Phong Nha Coco Riverside

review.comment_positive: Amazing views of mountains and river! We had a great stay here and enjoyed the caves of Phong Nha. Staff were very accommodating with an early check-in and so helpful in booking tours. The pho breakfast was delicious.

review.rating: homestay parfait avec accueil chaleureux. Je recommanderais à mes amis ou ma famille.
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
- L’emplacement idéal dans la ville 
- L’accueil plus que parfait de toute la famille ( Au moins 3 générations ?) 
- Nous sommes arrivés à Phong Nha à 4h du matin par le bus. A notre arrivée à l’hôtel, on nous a ouvert une chambre non réservée pour dormir quelques heures puis nous avons fait le check in de la chambre prévue à 11h. (moyennent un petit supplément) 
- Nous avons pu louer un scooter très rapidement avec essence 
- Service de laverie disponible si besoin 
- Terrasse parfaite avec vue pour boire un verre en fin d’après midi après un long périple en scooter. 
- Chambre confortable et propre.
review.comment_negative: - Rien

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Đôi nhìn ra quang cảnh Núi
review.comment_positive: Khung cảnh ở homestay quá là đẹp và hùng vĩ. Anh chị chủ thì lúc nào cũng hỗ trợ mọi người cũng như gợi ý về những tour du lịch hay trong khu vực. Nếu bạn có đi du lịch một mình thì cũng đừng lo nhé, những người bạn ở cùng homestay rất thân thiện, và bạn có thể bắt chuyện với họ.

Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
Homestay carinissima, con l'affaccio direttamente sul fiume! 
Hung e sua moglie sono gentilissimi, sorridenti e disponibili a soddisfare le tue richieste e ad aiutarti in tutto. La nostra stanza aveva una fantastica vista sul fiume. Tramite loro puoi tranquillamente organizzare escursioni nel parco e ti possono aiutare anche per prenotare biglietti di bus, treno ecc.
Consigliatissimo!
review.comment_negative: Se posso trovare un unico piccolo difetto è la doccia senza separazione nel bagno, che quindi allaga tutto il pavimento, ma nulla di rilevante

review.rating: nice people, nice amenities, and convenient location
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi
review.comment_positive:
The family owning the place was really nice and helped us for a lot of stuff. After our tour of the caves was cancelled due to the rain they found us another one which happened to be great. They also serve (great) food and breakfast so we we were able to have diner after getting off the bus even though it was late. 
The rooms are very clean. 
Also, the house is opened directly on the river so raining or not you can enjoy the water. 
close to a bus station (walking distance). 
Wish we could have stayed longer !!
